verses.verse: The Spirit <WH7307> of the Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH3068> is on me; <WH3068> because Yahweh has anointed <WH4886> me to preach good news <WH1319> to the humble. <WH6035> He has sent <WH7971> me to bind up <WH2280> the brokenhearted, <WH7665> to proclaim <WH7121> liberty <WH1865> to the captives, <WH7617> and release <WH6495> to those who are bound; <WH631>
to proclaim <WH7121> the year <WH8141> of Yahweh <WH3068>'s favor, <WH7522> and the day <WH3117> of vengeance <WH5359> of our God; <WH430> to comfort <WH5162> all who mourn; <WH57>

to appoint <WH7760> to those who mourn <WH57> in Zion, <WH6726> to give <WH5414> to them a garland <WH6287> for ashes, <WH665> the oil <WH8081> of joy <WH8342> for mourning, <WH60> the garment <WH4594> of praise <WH8416> for the spirit <WH7307> of heaviness; <WH3544> that they may be called <WH7121> trees <WH352> of righteousness, <WH6664> the planting <WH4302> of Yahweh, <WH3068> that he may be glorified. <WH6286>

They shall build <WH1129> the old <WH5769> wastes, <WH2723> they shall raise up <WH6965> the former <WH7223> desolations, <WH8074> and they shall repair <WH2318> the waste <WH2721> cities, <WH5892> the desolations <WH8074> of many <WH1755> generations. <WH1755>
Strangers <WH2114> shall stand <WH5975> and feed <WH7462> your flocks, <WH6629> and foreigners <WH5236> <WH1121> shall be your plowmen <WH406> and your vinedressers. <WH3755>

But you shall be named <WH7121> the priests <WH3548> of Yahweh; <WH3068> men will call <WH559> you the ministers <WH8334> of our God: <WH430> you will eat <WH398> the wealth <WH2428> of the nations, <WH1471> and you will boast <WH3235> in their glory. <WH3519>

Instead of your shame <WH1322> you shall have double; <WH4932> and instead of dishonor <WH3639> they shall rejoice <WH7442> in their portion: <WH2506> therefore in their land <WH776> they shall possess <WH3423> double; <WH4932> everlasting <WH5769> joy shall be to them. <WH8057>

"For I, <WH3068> Yahweh, love <WH157> justice, <WH4941> I hate <WH8130> robbery <WH1498> with iniquity; <WH5930> and I will give <WH5414> them their recompense <WH6468> in truth, <WH571> and I will make <WH3772> an everlasting <WH5769> covenant with them. <WH1285>

Their seed <WH2233> shall be known <WH3045> among the nations, <WH1471> and their offspring <WH6631> among <WH8432> the peoples; <WH5971> all who see <WH7200> them shall acknowledge <WH5234> them, <WH2233> that they are the seed which Yahweh <WH3068> has blessed. <WH1288>"

I will greatly <WH7797> rejoice <WH7797> in Yahweh, <WH3068> my soul <WH5315> shall be joyful <WH1523> in my God; <WH430> for he has clothed <WH3847> me with the garments <WH899> of salvation, <WH3468> he has covered <WH3271> me with the robe <WH4598> of righteousness, <WH6666> as a bridegroom <WH2860> decks <WH3547> himself with a garland, <WH6287> and as a bride <WH3618> adorns <WH5710> herself with her jewels. <WH3627>

For as the earth <WH776> brings forth <WH3318> its bud, <WH6780> and as the garden <WH1593> causes the things that are sown <WH2221> in it to spring forth; <WH6779> so the Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH3069> will cause righteousness <WH6666> and praise <WH8416> to spring forth <WH6779> before all the nations. <WH1471>
